articles.title: Apple reportedly launching a new event invite feature code-named Confetti - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple will be giving iCloud users a new way to invite people to parties, meetings, and other events, according to Bloomberg’s Mark Gurman. The company has
articles.content:
Apple will be giving iCloud users a new way to invite people to parties, meetings, and other events, according to Bloombergs Mark Gurman.
The company has code-named the service Confetti, and it coul… [+400 chars]

articles.author: Emma Burleigh
articles.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang says everyone should get an AI tutor right away - Fortune
articles.description: The chip leader says the tech should now teach humans, but doesn’t believe it will replace them in the workforce.
